name: Cowboy Cupid
description:
How to play:

  • Shoot Speech Bubbles - Left Mouse
  • Reload - Space
  • Hover over something if you're unsure what it does!

You're a speed dating cowboy looking for love! But.... all you know is rodeo, GUN and SHOOT, so conversations aren't your strong suit! Don't fret partner!  Use your firearm to learn how to hold a conversation on the fly.

This prototype is what happens when you try and squeeze light gun shooter mechanics into a dating sim with a complex dialogue  system that acts like a deck of cards!

Yes it plays about as crazy as it sounds...
